testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P1) user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "fast@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P2) user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: guest user Select Euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user Select Euro currency option from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then Euro Symbol is displayed on 4 product..................................passed

testcase.name: search using product sku
testcase.system-out: When user click on search field.............................................passed And user search with "SCI_FAITH"............................................passed Then user could find "SCI_FAITH" in product details.........................passed

testcase.name: search using product sku 2
testcase.system-out: When user click on search field.............................................passed And user search with "APPLE_CAM"............................................passed Then user could find "APPLE_CAM" in product details.........................passed

testcase.name: search using product sku 3
testcase.system-out: When user click on search field.............................................passed And user search with "SF_PRO_11"............................................passed Then user could find "SF_PRO_11" in product details.........................passed

testcase.classname: hover Categories Feature and select subcategory
testcase.name: user could hover on categories
user click on Nokia slider

failure.message: Bug found in nokia URL expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
When user choose on Nokia slider............................................passed And user click on Nokia slider..............................................passed Then user navigate to Nokia URL.............................................failed
